Campbell Cotts (21 Eprel 1902 - 19 Febụwarị 1964) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn nke a mụrụ na Cape Colony. Onye bụbu onye ọka iwu na onye na-ede uri, Cotts gụrụ akwụkwọ na Cambridge ma lụọ agha n'agha ụwa nke abụọ, nweta ọkwa nke 1st Lieutenant na Black Watch (Royal Highland Regiment). Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya gụnyere ịpụta na Broadway n'ihu Katharine Hepburn na mweghachi nke Shaw's The Millionairess na Shubert Theatre na 1952.
